text: Juan López Alfaro (1823-1874) was Leader of the Free State of Isthmus in Panama from (1840-1841). He was the first inhabitant, entrepreneur & visionary of Antofagasta, commune and city of northern Chile. Don Juan López was Born around 1825 and settled on the antofagastina coast around 1845, when He landed to the south of the current city in the sector called "Punta de Jara". he also was Leader of Panama. Category:1823 births Category:1874 deaths Category:Panamanian politicians
title: Juan López
